attributes.action: mark parking zones properly with signs on there sides like bus stops and colour code them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government should make all councils put parking signs on there side like a bus stop sign so they can be seen clearly not set back into the bushes!

They should also colour code different areas such as pay and display zones in white and others such as permit holders yellow. this will clearly show where not to park!
